Package src.coms

package src.coms
Handles communication and networking for multiplayer Battleship.

This package manages:

  • Network connections between players
  • Capability to host a game as a Server
  • Capability to connect a game as a Client
  • Message passing and protocol handling via polymorph classes
  • an AI bot opponent with 3 difficulties
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Bot
    Bot is a subclass of NetworkPlayer that acts like a client object and also generates the responsible answers
    Client
    Client is a subclass of NetworkPlayer that is used to act as the Client of the Network connection
    NetworkPlayer
    NetworkPlayer is an abstract upper class for the network communication
    Server
    Server is a subclass of NetworkPlayer that is used to act as the host of the Network connection
